title: ASUS ROG Strix G Core i7 9th Gen - (16 GB/1 TB HDD/256 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home/4 GB Graphics/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650/60 Hz) G531GT-AL041T Gaming Laptop  (15.6 inch, Black, 2.4 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 2.6 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 4.5 GHz
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit Anti-glare Display(120 Hz Refresh Rate)

product_description.Functional Design: This laptop's design has been designed inspired by ASUS's collaboration with the BMW Designworks Group and it offers cutting-edge cooling. Its sculpted shape and stealthy surfaces add more elegance to its overall appearance.
product_description.Performance: This laptop facilitates a powerful performance with the presence of the 9th Gen Intel Core-i7 processor and 16 GB of DDR4 RAM. Oh, and you needn’t worry about space either, as this laptop comes with an SSD capacity of 256 GB.
product_description.NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650 Graphic Processo: Get set for superior graphics with this laptop, thanks to its NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650 graphics processor.
product_description.Dedicated GPU Power: This laptop, with its dedicated GPU power, ensures easy multitasking for all your creative pursuits. The NVIDIA Optimus feature will optimize your laptop to ensure a great graphics performance.
product_description.Intelligent Cooling: With a well-ventilated exterior, dual N-blade fans, and ultra-thin fins, this laptop has everything in place to ensure efficient cooling, especially when you are gaming for long hours.
product_description.Ideal Display for Gaming: Do not miss out on your moves while gaming. This laptop’s rapid refresh rate (120 Hz), smooth graphics at high FPS, and expansive display ensure that nothing comes in between you and your game.
product_description.Aura Sync: Let the Aura Sync lights on your keypad take centre stage while you game. What's more, you can connect your Aura Sync-compatible peripherals and coordinate the colours.
product_description.Keyboard Optimised for Gaming: This laptop’s keyboard features transparent WASD caps and translucent edges to help you with your gaming needs. With the N-key rollover and Anti-ghosting technology, this keyboard lets you game more precisely. The ROG Overstroke technology registers keypresses earlier in the stroke, thereby paving the way for a responsive typing experience.
product_description.Immersive Audio: This laptop comes with the Smart Amp technology which monitors the audio output and keeps the speakers with the thermal limits, thereby enhancing its durability. As a result, the sound that is produced has less distortion, high dynamic range, more bass, and high potential output.
product_description.Strong Connectivity: The ROG RangeBoost technology establishes a stable Wi-Fi signal so that you can game without any network problems.
product_description.Stutter-free VR: Explore new dimensions of gaming with this laptop, thanks to its GeForce GTX graphics processor that ensures a smooth, low-latency, and stutter-free VR experience.

review:
Firstly thank you very much flipkart for delivering the product on time. Ordered on 16th july and got delivered today. Product was packed perfectly as well. Now regarding the product:

1. Excellent design, build quality and looks. The shining ROG logo, RGB lighting at bottom and rgb keyboard.
2. Awsome performance of laptop. Intel core i7 9th gen with 16GB RAM is just mindblowing
3. GTX 1650 4GB Graphics is just perfect for many new games.
4. Dual storage ( 1TB HDD firecuda + 256GB SSD ) is awsome and perfect.
5. Perfect display screen having 120hz display.
6. Battery is ok. Lasts max 5hrs on light use and 1hr on heavy gaming.
7. Speakers are also awsome.


Overall its an excellant laptop from ASUS and highly recommended for all who planning to buy it.

Overall Rating 4/5. First impression was awesome.good quality packing and good outer finish,even though its plastic its still makes you say wow when you open the box.Main attraction is the lighting in keyboard and on the sides.its simply amazing.battery life is good speed and other features are awesome. charging and hdmi and lan port are at backside of laptop thats a huge plus. Has no webcamera thats a negative and has no cd drive that doesn't matter because we dont use cds now. has a writing speed of average 100mbps thats awesome. and as in advertisement it shows only 4GB Graphics ram but Laptop actually has 8GB Ram [4 GB Nvidia GTx and 4GB Intel HD Graphics] laptop shares both rams so technically this is a 8GB Graphics Ram laptop. Sound system is supported by Dolby and this laptop has excellent Speakers,sound is superb quality. has additional battery modes apart from windows mods to help save battery and increase its life span.Asus center makes the warranty and product registrations easier. along with this laptop you will be getting 11,000 Rupees worth Games/Softwares for free as a part of promotion from intel.best laptop you can get at this price range.if you are looking for a affordable gaming laptop then this is your best choice.

It is a very nice laptop with best performance and display quality is also a plus point and RGB lighting is also good.
only 2 Drawbacks are there...
1) No Camera
2) No Type C port and also right side numberpad on keyboard
but if u want it for performance then it is Beast..also have16gb DDR4 Ram Which is so fast..
also there is no storage problem 1Tb HDD..and 256 SSD (in which windows are installed and also which is very much faster)... i will say it is a must buy laptop if you are planning to buy it at this price..i purchased it during Big Billion Days at cost of 69990-/rs only..So i am very Much Happy With it......

2 Month Review : The specs are i7 9th gen combined with a 16 GB Single Channel Ram, 256 SSD and 1 TB HDD. Nvidia's GTX 1650 handles almost all the graphic intensive titles pretty well.The base clock of the processor is around 2.7 Ghz and can be turbo boosted around 4.5Ghz,which is pretty much good figure.The laptop performance is absolutely great. I mainly use it for editing purposes (Adobe Premiere CC 2019) and the application works absolutely perfect without any lag or anysort of hang.I have also run games like Assassinscreed Syndicate, Maxpayne 3,GTA V, Forza Horizon 4,FIFA 20 etc, all in ultra settings and there was no frame drop at all.The battery backup is not something that you can rely on a gaming laptop,this laptop gives around 4-5 hours in silent mode and in performance you can get around 2 hours. The main thing I noticed is that the Turbo mode won't turn on until you plug it into a power source and without plugged in you won't be able to achieve the required frame rate in some games like GTA V, Witcher 3 etc. The 120hz display is an absolute bliss. But when you plug in and plug out, the refresh rate automatically lowers to 48hz which is disturbing and to turn it back to 120hz you either have to plug it in or go to display settings and change it back.The thermals are also great in this laptop.After hours of intesive gaming only the portion where the Cpu and Gpu located gets heated up, there is not much heat coming onto the keyboard.The speakers below average.The trackpad is precise, the RGB lighting combined with Armoury Crate is something great to work on and have fun.The built quality is absolutely stunning.There is only minimal(very less) flex of the screen.The keyboard is also fine but after a 2 months usage my "backspace" button started to sound a bit different. And for 2-3 times I heard popping sound from the speakers while booting up and it continued and then I had to restart the system, it maybe due to some bug on Sonic Sound Studio Software.i7 9th gen is an absolute beast.It's more than a budget gaming laptop,you can go for it.

Good to buy
The specifications are totally worthy .
excellent gaming graphics and best FPS
Also good for Rendering and 3D MODELLING Software
this laptop gives Turbo power when plugged in charger and can enjoy gaming

if u r gamer this laptop is perfect for gaming. current are famous game like hitman2, gta5, mafia3, call of duty advance warfare, etc. play smothly.... negative point~ free game offer, rubbish very poor offer...in high settings fan noise audible... and keypad heated. but these are acceptable, performance like beast, & offer price also good.i bought 74999 in this price range 16gbram, 256 ssd, and also upgradeble.. so do not think more..... like gaming just go for it.this review i submit near of 2 months after purchase

I was not much into the colourful keyboard and the bottom side of the laptop until I got this laptop in my hand and experienced it in real time. the aura sync which is what asus calls the Rgb keyboard is absolutely beautiful in all of its Glory. the looks of the laptop are classy. even though the laptop is made out of good plastic, it no way feels cheap and is almost premium feeling. the hinges are meant to have a better than normal design and improve the life (yes the aren't any normal kind of hinges you see in a laptop, and it looks cool too).
the display of the laptop is sleek with minimal bezels and the rest of the body feels a bit bulky but nothing too much.
the port placement is weird , all the USB are on the same side, the charging HDMI and Ethernet are on the back which is good actually, with no ports on the right. the fans blow the air out from the back and not from sides which is also quiet good.

the display is beautiful, might not be the best like an AMOLED screen but it is quiet good and the minimal bezels do provide immersive experience, the colours are quiet good and viewing angles are great. the 120hz goodness is amazing which only works when plugged in and is on 60 hz when running on battery.
the keys are fine, the lack of numpad even on the trackpad is a slight bummer to me atleast.

performance wise this is a beast.

it has silent , performance & turbo mode(only available when plugged)
About gaming :
I could run pubg at 70-85 FPS with auto configured settings(which was high), 55-60 fps on ultra settings & 100+ on low settings.
fortnite runs 70+ upto 85 fps on high settings and the auto recommended settings were on epic which runs at 60 fps.
GTA V auto configured to very high settings on most and high in few and it ran 55-65 fps, I've changed the settings to mix of medium and high and run at 70-90 fps and sometimes touches 100 or more.

what impressed me is that no matter the game settings the laptop handled it fine (even if it had to reduce the fps by a bit) and no game ran unpleasantly with hiccups in performance or stuck. but it may happen if you run another heavy app in the background.

the cooling is fine , a lot of heat is dissipated from the laptop while in turbo mode running a heavy game or any other heavy program and the fans on turbo mode can be heard but not much so as to call it a bummer.

overall this is a lovely laptop for daily use, office use, gaming, or any other high intensity purposes. the display makes browsing or media consuming a delight, the aura sync is a neat party trick (coming from a person who isn't much into such gimmicks) & this device is worth every penny you spend.
the device is fantastic. the look is awesome and it performs beyond my expectations... best in this price range.. bdw got it for 87k on A certain sale... highly recommend it

Pros :
I7 - 9750h at this price point
Great looks even though it’s plastic made
Asus aura sync looks great
Runs most AAA on high ( ac odyssey - 45 fps, shadow of the tomb raider - 40 to 50 fps, dota 2 - 80 to 100 )
120 hz
Great screen, good colors, great viewing angle
Good keyboard
Fans are silent

Cons :
Brightness is a bit low
Speakers are bad ( use headphones )
No webcam ( not a big deal though )
Moderate battery ( duh gaming laptop )
Runs a bit hot while gaming ( cooling pad recommended )

Laptop it's really good. The performance of laptop is top notch .The Armoury crate software provided by Asus is excellent i would say , you will get a good control of the laptop.The storage on the laptop is adequate enough to store your data, but if you install more games at a time , then the storage might be an issue.The gpu performs really good on this device , no issue with gpu at all. And the way they designed the laptop for heat exchange is really good.The laptop doesn't get hot unless and until you do extensive gaming .I got this laptop during big billion day for 70k.Overall it is a very good laptop.I would rate it 4/5 because i feel for this price , they would have given Nvidia geforce gtx 1660 ti gpu, and also they have skipped on usb type-c and sd card reader and a webcam.If these factors doesn't bother you , then you can straight away pick it.This is a really good choice in the market , or else if you can extend your budget then you can take a look at Predator helios 300 which has Nvidia geforce gtx 1660ti gpu , usb type-c port etc

I don't know how to review in details but here's my say on it because I bought it.
I bought it exactly a year ago.
So the about the body, it's pretty stylish just like you see in the image. The colors are everywhere. It's body is built strong and it can handle some hits. But you shouldn't be careless enough to drop it.
The keypad is good but the arrow keys are small. You might take a time to adjust with them but it's all good.
The screen is decent. Can handle lights and it won't reflect.
So about the performance, the main thing. It's the best part of the laptop. I am no a pro gamer but I have played a lot of games like pubg, gtav, assassin's creed Odyssey etc and they all worked fine. Even in high graphics you won't notice any change.
But there was a problem while doing softwares. I also use it to do SketchUp and CAD. And it kinda gets slow when there are too many rendering and it gets you frustrated.
Talking about the battery life, it's weak. You can use it without plugging into socket. You can play music, videos and do some office works without charging and will last for 3-4 hours but for gaming, always play while charging. Or else it won't work. Simple as that.
And the sound system is pretty good. Not so dynamic but it's loud and clear.
And there are few features given by asus to enhance the experience. Which is pretty good.
The only sad thing about this laptop is that it doesn't have a camera. I couldn't do video call on laptop during online classes and that kinda frustrated me because you pay so kuch and you don't get a camera. But that's just because of the classes.
So in overall, I think this laptop has every specs you need at a right price. And that's why I bought it. And I have had no issues with it upto date. It's been a year. Works just like the first day. You can go for it.
